summary: This appears to be a calendar entry or scheduling document for a proceeding in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, scheduled for November 22-23, 2021, to be held via Zoom. It lists Allison Stoddart as an attendee.

events.title: Scheduled Court Proceeding for Maxwell Case
events.description: A scheduled event for the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, to be conducted via Zoom.

keyFacts: A court proceeding for United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell was scheduled for November 22-23, 2021.
The proceeding was to be held remotely via a Zoom meeting.
Allison Stoddart is identified as an attendee for this event.
